original_title: From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler
overview: Two runaway kids hide in a museum. Once they are locked inside overnight, they try to solve a mystery about a statue supposedly carved by Michaelangelo, known as "The Angel". Will they solve the mystery in time?
tagline: A Little Mystery Can Bring Magic Into Anyone's Life.
title: From the Mixed-Up Files of Mrs. Basil E. Frankweiler
